participant_1.background:
My wife is a college professor.
My mother was a concert pianist.
I have one little girl.
I work as a trauma surgeon.

participant_2.background:
I don t like being asked a lot of questions.
I have a shopping addiction.
I don t like when people get too close to me.
I think about food a lot.
I love the forest.

content.text: Hi, I'm [user 1's name]. I'm a trauma surgeon.
Hi, I'm [user 2's name]. I'm a shopaholic.
Oh, that's interesting. What do you like to shop for?
I like to shop for everything! Clothes, shoes, accessories, makeup... you name it.
I see. I'm not much of a shopper myself. I'm more of a saver.
That's interesting. I guess we're different in that way.
So, what do you do for fun?
I like to spend time with my family and friends. I also like to go hiking, biking, and camping.
Oh, that sounds like fun. I like to go shopping, go to the movies, and eat out.
I see. I'm not much of a movie person myself. I prefer to read books.
That's interesting. I love to read books too. What are some of your favorite books?
I like to read all kinds of books, but my favorite genres are sci-fi and fantasy.
Oh, I love those genres too! What are some of your favorite books in those genres?
I love the Harry Potter series, the Lord of the Rings series, and the Dune series.
Oh, I love those books too! We have a lot in common.
Yeah, we do. It's nice to meet someone who shares my interests.
